name: silph-scope
short_effect: Used to identify the true forms of ghosts in Pokémon Tower.

flavor_text_entries.emerald:
SILPH CO’s scope
makes unseeable
POKéMON visible.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A scope that makes unseeable
POKéMON visible.
It is made by SILPH CO.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
A scope that lets you see what cannot usually be seen.
It is made by Silph Co.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
A scope that lets you see what cannot usually be seen.
It is made by Silph Co.
